name: Charm Necklaces | Set of 2
description:
This set of 2 perfect necklaces is a must have for every girly girl's jewellery collection. The romantic charms featured on the 'At The Vanity' and 'I Heart Paris' charm necklaces will make you feel like a true princess.

At The Vanity charm necklace features a mirror, perfume bottle, and picture frame.

I Heart Paris charm necklace features an Eiffel tower, tiara, and carousel.

Necklaces are antique silver in colour. Chains are approximately 18.5 inches in length.

name: Festive Collection Set | 2 Dresses
description: If you're looking for a couple of festive fun dresses this season, look no further. Buy both the Red Moon dress and the Gold Asteroid dress for just £199! That's a saving of £60! Offer ends January 31st. Dresses are handmade to order and can take up to one week to be made. We can not guarantee delivery times so please order early to avoid disappointment. The Red Moon & Gold Asteroid dresses are part of the 2013 Festive Collection and are Limited Edition. *We encourage international customers to add the Recorded Delivery option to their order as we do not accept liability for orders that go missing during transit. All UK & Ireland orders are a sent via Recorded Delivery. FAQ / SIZE CHART | TERMS & CONDITIONS / DELIVERY

name: Galatea V | Red
description: Gorgeous red lace V back version of our popular Galatea in Nude dress. You have the option of having a full length or half length lining. Ultra glamorous yet still feminine, this dress is perfect for prom, a dance, or a gala event. Galatea is the name of one of the planet Neptune's Moons. The Galatea dress is part of the Neptune Collection (2013). All dresses are handmade to order with love and care in London, UK. name: Galatea | Nude
description: This beautiful, feminine, vintage style dress covered in lace features unique shoulder detail and is perfect for evening events, bridesmaid dresses, and even brides! The nude colour suits practically every skin tone and the floor length adds elegance, grace and sophistication. Galatea is the name of one of the planet Neptune's Moons. The Galatea dress is part of the Neptune Collection (2013). All dresses are handmade to order with love and care in London, UK. name: Aphrodite (New Style!)
description: This gorgeous ivory and pink dress is perfect for that special occasion. Using the same shape and fabric as our popular Luna dress, we've transformed this dress into a beautiful, Swarovski adorned number which can be worn with nude heels and big hair for added glamour! Two handmade flowers cover the one shoulder strap and one large flower placed on the hip. All our flowers are handmade by us; each petal is cut, singed, curled and pleated before being made into a beautiful flower. We then add small Swarovski crystals individually to add sparkle. The flowers are removable for when you need to clean the dress. Aphrodite is the Goddess of Love. This dress represents our neighbouring planet Venus. The Aphrodite Dress is part of the Starry Nights Collection (2013). All dresses are handmade to order with love and care in London, UK. Please allow extra time for made-to-measure dresses. *We encourage international customers to add the Recorded Delivery option to their order as we do not accept liability for orders that go missing during transit. All UK & Ireland orders are a sent via Recorded Delivery. FAQ / SIZE CHART | TERMS & CONDITIONS / DELIVERY

description: Simple, elegant, slim fitting dress with small train. The bright coral chiffon has a flattering texture to it. Straps can be added, please contact us if you would like to customise this dress. Larissa is the name of one of the planet Neptune's Moons. The Larissa dress is part of the Neptune Collection (2013). name: Freya - Original Design
description:
One-off original design of the Freya dress. This is a size 6-8 dress with no faults. We redesigned the dress because the fabrics we used with this version were discontinued.

Swarovski crystals adorn the sides of the waist and the bottom portion of the skirt. This is a unique, one of a kind dress.

name: Heng-O | Jade (short)
description: Beautiful short jade green version of the Heng-O dress. Lined with silky satin and finished with a layer of gorgeous chiffon and embellished with silver studs. The back is scooped but you can still wear a strapless bra with this style. The hem is cut slightly wavy to add a whimsical feel. [Belt not included] Heng-O is the Chinese Moon Goddess. The Heng-O dress is part of the Blue Moon Collection (2013). All dresses are handmade to order with love and care in London, UK. name: Iris
description: We have used a 100% silk fabric in cream with a gorgeous drape for Iris. This dress is loose fitting so you can just slip it on at the last minute when rushing out to a party. Cinch in at the waist with your favourite belt and you're good to go! [Belt not included] Iris is the Messenger Goddess. This dress represents our neighbouring planet Mercury. name: Aurora
description: If you've had the same LBD for the past decade, it's time to make a switch, honey! Update your wardrobe with this sequined scooped back number inspired by the dress worn by Tatiana Thumbtzen in Michael Jackson's short film/music video The Way You Make Me Feel. Although named after an asteroid darker than soot, we at Angel Armogida like a bit of sparkle so we decided to glam up this retro dress, perfect for absolutely any event! Say hello to your new Little Black Dress. Aurora is the Goddess of the Dawn and is the name of one of the biggest and darkest asteroids on the main belt between Jupiter and Mars (because Earth, Jupiter and Saturn are just not pretty enough names, are they girls?). The Aurora Dress is part of the Starry Nights Collection (2013). All dresses are handmade to order with love and care in London, UK. Please allow extra time for made-to-measure dresses. *We encourage international customers to add the Recorded Delivery option to their order as we do not accept liability for orders that go missing during transit. name: Luna
description: This is a modern, thigh skimming royal blue cocktail dress with flattering Swarovski embellishments. The colour of this dress is extremely flattering on every skin tone. The top is boned which helps hold it’s shape and the Swarovski embellishments are positioned to create the illusion of a slimmer waist. This dress can be worn for all sorts of events due to it’s shorter length and younger feel. Perfect for a wedding, birthday party, or a nice date. Wear with high heels and big hair for that cute-sexy look! [Third photo shows dress true to colour. Photos with model shows colour slightly lighter.] Luna is the Roman Moon Goddess. The Luna dress is part of the Blue Moon Collection (2013). All dresses are handmade to order with love and care in London, UK. Please allow extra time for made-to-measure dresses. *We encourage international customers to add the Recorded Delivery option to their order as we do not accept liability for orders that go missing during transit. name: Freya
description: This is the new style for the Freya dress which was previously a satin gown with thigh length slit. This newer version features a more flattering and supportive bust area with the silver sequined fabric extending to cover the whole body. The shiny semi-opaque chiffon is used to create a fish-tail look with beautiful Swarovski crystals dotted over it to add sparkle when it catches the light. Freya is the Scandinavian Moon Goddess. The Freya dress is part of the Blue Moon Collection (2013). All dresses are handmade to order with love and care in London, UK. Please allow extra time for made-to-measure dresses. *We encourage international customers to add the Recorded Delivery option to their order as we do not accept liability for orders that go missing during transit. name: Selene
description: The Selene dress is an elegant, silver floor length ball gown with beautiful Swarovski waist trim detail and a train. Our priority for this dress was to make it backless yet still flattering for those with a bigger bust. High neck or tight front tops can be extremely unflattering when you are big chested and going braless so we hope that this dress has answered some of you bigger chested ladies’ prayers. The combination of the draped neck and thick double layered satin disguises the shape and size of the bust while still giving that sultry feel you get from a going braless. There is a tie at the back of the neck so you can adjust the dress to make it most comfortable for you. This dress will make you feel sexy from every angle so we suggest wearing it with your hair up to show off your bare back. Selene is the Greek Moon Goddess. The Selene dress is part of the Blue Moon Collection (2013). All dresses are handmade to order with love and care in London, UK. Please allow extra time for made-to-measure dresses. *We encourage international customers to add the Recorded Delivery option to their order as we do not accept liability for orders that go missing during transit. name: International Recorded Delivery
description:
This option is for international (outside the UK & Ireland) deliveries only. If you add this product to your cart we will ship your order via Royal Mail's International Recorded Signed For™ Delivery which means you will need to sign for your parcel upon arrival.

If you choose not to add this option, your products will be shipped via standard 1st Class delivery. We are not responsible for orders that go missing when sent via 1st Class.

UK & Ireland deliveries are always sent out using Royal Mail's 1st Class Recorded Signed For™ Delivery as standard - you do not need to add this option.
